trans-unit.source: Creates a Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) signature.
trans-unit.target: 创建数字签名算法 (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) 签名。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The instance of the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) that holds the key.
trans-unit.target: 包含密钥的数字签名算法 (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" /> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的密钥初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The data to be signed.
trans-unit.target: 要签名的数据。

trans-unit.source: Creates the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) PKCS #1 signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的数据创建数字签名算法 (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) PKCS #1 签名。

trans-unit.source: The digital signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 指定数据的数字签名。

trans-unit.source: The resulting signature data can be verified by using <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用验证生成的签名数据<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rgbHash" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgbHash" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The OID is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: OID 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The DSA key is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: DSA 密钥为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use for the signature formatter.
trans-unit.target: 用于签名格式化程序的哈希算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the hash algorithm for the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) signature formatter.
trans-unit.target: 指定数字签名算法 (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) 签名格式化程序的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="strName" /> parameter does not map to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1" /> hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="strName" /> 参数不映射到 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1" /> 哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> that holds the key.
trans-unit.target: 包含密钥的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the key to be used for the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) signature formatter.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于数字签名算法 (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) 签名格式化程序的密钥。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。
